actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require an annual report from the Director of the Congressional Office of Technology Assessment on charges in payment amounts for certain surgical transplantation procedures.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require the Director of the Office of Technology Assessment to annually review changes affecting the cost of surgical procedures for the implantation of artificial devices and organs for which Medicare makes payments: (1) in medical technology, skill, and procedures; and (2) in the costs of artificial devices and organs. Requires the Director to recommend to the Secretary of Health and Human Services changes in the amounts that should be recognized as reasonable for purposes of Medicare payments.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require an annual report from the Director of the Congressional Office of Technology Assessment on charges in payment amounts for certain surgical transplantation procedures.
